class schemas.cloudinary_qr.ImageResponse(*, cloudinary_url: str, qr_code_url: str)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

Schema for the response containing Cloudinary and QR code URLs.

cloudinary_url

The URL of the image stored in Cloudinary.

Type:

str

qr_code_url

The URL of the generated QR code for the image.

Type:

str

cloudinary_url: str
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

qr_code_url: str
